text: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذۡتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيۡرِي لَأَجۡعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَسۡجُونِينَ

translation.en: [Pharaoh] said, "If you take a god other than me, I will surely place you among those imprisoned
translation.id: Dia (Fir'aun) berkata, "Sungguh, jika engkau menyembah Tuhan selain aku, pasti aku masukkan engkau ke dalam penjara
